body:
Debian Jessie (PPC) gives me warnings, which go away with a default empty constructor in `WalletTx`:

```
[...]
  CXX      libbitcoin_server_a-validationinterface.o
  AR       libbitcoin_server.a
  CXX      interfaces/libbitcoin_wallet_a-wallet.o
interfaces/wallet.cpp: In member function âvirtual interfaces::WalletTx interfaces::{anonymous}::WalletImpl::getWalletTx(const uint256&)â:
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
         return {};
                 ^
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txin_is_mineâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_is_mineâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_addressâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_address_is_mineâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::creditâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::debitâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::changeâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::timeâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::value_mapâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:306:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::is_coinbaseâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp: In member function âvirtual interfaces::WalletTx interfaces::{anonymous}::WalletImpl::getWalletTxDetails(const uint256&, interfaces::WalletTxStatus&, interfaces::WalletOrderForm&, bool&, int&)â:
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
         return {};
                 ^
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txin_is_mineâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_is_mineâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_addressâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::txout_address_is_mineâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::creditâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::debitâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::changeâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::timeâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::value_mapâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
interfaces/wallet.cpp:355:17: warning: missing initializer for member âinterfaces::WalletTx::is_coinbaseâ [-Wmissing-field-initializers]
  CXX      wallet/libbitcoin_wallet_a-coincontrol.o
[...]
```
title: interface/wallet: get rid of missing initializer warnings
